Package MiniProject2

Class KMeans

java.lang.Object
MiniProject2.KMeans
public class KMeans
extends java.lang.Object
this class represents the K-means algorithm for classifying

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void assignCluster()
    this function create the classification, add points to the cluster whoes have the minimal distance with the current point(from the center point of the cluster)
    void calculate()
    this function calls an iterative method for calculate the Kmeans, for grouping into clusters
    private void calculateCentroids()
    this function calculating the center points of the clusters
    private void clearClusters()
    this function clear the states of all clusters for recalculating
    private java.util.List<Point> getCentroids()
    this function gets a list of the center points of the cluster, by the geometries the geometry holds the field of the geometry and from their we can know the center point
    java.util.List<Cluster> getClusters()
    get method for the clusters list field
    void init​(java.util.List<Point> points)
    this function start the process of classifying
    private void plotClusters()
    this function print the state of the clusters
